body:
I was just wondering what people think about me in generl, PvP and what you think of me as a person(tbh im not happy with myself i put out a lot of salt so i dont expext alot of good replies)/what i need to improve on?
I wont be responding to any offensive comments cus its just a waste of both our times :p

title: What do you think?

replies.body: I think you should improve on your maturity and learn not to go way too overboard on your jokes. That is my opinion. On your pvp skills, they are good and I don't think you need to improve them as much as I need to improve mine.
replies.body_tagged: I think you should improve on your maturity and learn not to go way too overboard on your jokes. That is my opinion. On your pvp skills, they are good and I don't think you need to improve them as much as I need to improve mine.

replies.body: your pvp skills is below average, you think you're better then what you actually are, you're pretty salty but idc because its minecraft everyone is salty in the community, when you say that you have been playing on OCN for many years i interpret it as you being cocky and saying that you're very experienced and better then the average avicus player TBH you're really not

but you are an understed player and good at pvp
